summary: When using service brakes and trying to stop the vehicle, I have to  push down on the brake pedal multiple times to get the vehicle to stop. Which caused me to almost run several red lights and stop signs. While stopped at a stop light, and my foot is on the brake pedal, the pedal goes to the floor and I have to push down on the brakes multiple times. There is also air noise when  pushing down on the brake pedal.
